title: Internet Murder Revenge Fantasy
description: Internet Murder Revenge Fantasy is a comic written by merritt kopas and illustrated by a ton of incredible artists. The book is composed of seven interrelated poems about growing up on the internet in the â€™90s and early 2000s: making connections on MUDs, forums & chanboards, encountering alternatives to mainstream masculinity in anime and softcore lesbian porn, and outgrowing your roots while still feeling them clinging to you.
author: Merritt K.
